entry.title: What's So Great About Bridget Burt?
entry.content:
Let me preface this by saying that Bridget Burt is definitely in my top five favorite people. So let’s get down to brass tacks.

Five Things She Isn’t Good At

I could just say that Bridget’s the worst, but that doesn’t really get my point across. Just read through this list, and maybe I’ll be able to convince you.

1. Tact.

Some may say that I’m not good at this either. I totally agree. But Bridget is on another level.

2. Dancing.

Have you even seen her dance? It’s not so much awkward as it is hilarious.
